title: Why do politicians generally disbelieve in climate change theories while there is so much scientific proof? - Quora

response.answer_text: Actually, the vast, vast majority of politicians (like the vast, vast majority of all individuals) believe that the climate changes. But many politicians and individuals (hundreds of millions) are skeptical of the hypothesis that human emissions of CO2 are leading to apocalyptic global warming because there absolutely is NO proof of it. It is completely speculation based upon untested suppositions. In fact, this hypothesis cannot even be tested; therefore, it falls into the realm of pseudoscience as defined by Karl Popper, a renowned British academician and philosopher of science.
